Bell’s own take on hidden variables is perhaps interesting in this context (from 10.1103/RevModPhys.65.803, which I’m not expert enough to evaluate one way or another)
> To those for whom nonlocality is anathema, Bell’s Theorem finally spells the death of the hidden-variables program. ’But not for Bell.
